00028 
00029 class Render;  // This needs to be here because of mutual reference
00030 
00032 
00043 class Gui {
00044  protected:
00045   string FilePath;
00046 
00048   virtual void CreateWindow() {};
00049 
00051   virtual void Init();
00052 
00054   virtual void MainLoop();
00055 
00057 
00058  public:
00059   Gui(Render *render);
00060   virtual ~Gui() {};
00061 
00062   Render *R;
00063 
00065   virtual void Start();
00066 
00068   bool Finished;
00069 
00071   virtual void HandleEvents() = 0;
00072 
00074   virtual void ButtonHandle(int b) {};
00075 };
